item.title: VoiceInk Updates
item.description:
VoiceInk v0.62 Release Notes

âœ¨ Bug Fixes

  • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed Audio Input Device Bug(Use default Input Device/ Custom device now)
  • ðŸŽ¯ Improvement to transcript selection UI

    • VoiceInk v0.61 Release Notes

    âœ¨ New Updates & Fixes

    • ðŸŽ¯ Added the option to configure Audio input sources
    • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed dashboard loading jarring bug

    VoiceInk v0.60 Release Notes

    âœ¨ Bug Fixes & Improvements

    • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed hallucinations errors at the end
    • ðŸŽ¯ Huge speed & performance improvements
    • ðŸŽ¯ Removed support for intel devices

    VoiceInk v0.56 Release Notes

    âœ¨ Bug Fixes

    • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed auto-paste not working with notch recorder

    VoiceInk v0.55 Release Notes

    âœ¨ New Features

    • ðŸŽ¯ Notch Recorder View with better controls

    VoiceInk v0.54 Release Notes

    âœ¨ Bug Fixes & Improvements

    • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed Copy to clipboard not persisting
    • ðŸŽ¯ Added option to add clipboard context for AI enhancement
    • ðŸŽ¯ Added more menu bar options for quick access to important views

    VoiceInk v0.53 Release Notes

    âœ¨ Bug Fixes

    • ðŸŽ¯ Fixed trial not working
    • ðŸŽ¯ Improved Licence handling

    VoiceInk v0.52 Release Notes

    âœ¨ New Features

    • ðŸŽ¯ Added Support for AI enhancement Custom Prompt

    âœ¨ New Improvements

    • ðŸŽ¯ Simplified the Examples UI

    VoiceInk v0.51 Release Notes

    âœ¨ New Features

    • ðŸŽ¯ AI enhancement now supports clipboard context

    âœ¨ New Improvements

    • ðŸŽ¯ Batch delete transcripts from Transcript History View

    âœ¨ Facing Problems?

    VoiceInk v0.50 Release Notes

    âœ¨ New Features

    • ðŸŽ¯ Added suppport for showing both original as well as enhanced transcript in Transcript History View

    âœ¨ New Fixes

    • ðŸŽ¯ ESC button can now cancel the transcription even when processing

    âœ¨ Changes to the Pro Plan

    • ðŸŽ¯ VoiceInk has removed the free tier. You can keep using the existing versions for free though. All the future versions will required a paid plan.
